t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: If an item is missing from your package, it may have shipped separately. Learn how to check if the missing item is in another package.

t: What happens if I’ve forgot to include a small piece in the box when returning/refunding a large item to Amazon? - Quora

s: I have been notified by a customer that they have received only a single box out of a nested set of 3. Obviously there is no 100% way of proving this but it is extremely unlikely to be the case. They are also saying they don’t need the “missing” 2 boxes as they have had to purchase elsewhere ...

I had the same issue - only 1 box arrived so I'm missing the rails to put the bed together. The box with the headboard clearly states, on the outside, 1 of 2 boxes so not sure why this continues to be a problem for so many. I've waited 4 days to see if a 2nd box arrives - no luck so I called Amazon.

t: Returns and Replacements - FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: Frequently asked questions about returns and replacements of items you have ordered.

t: Incorrect, Damaged, or Missing Amazon Fresh or Whole Foods Market Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Items can be substituted or removed from your order after checkout due to availability. Check the order details in Your Account to see any substitutions or undeliverable items.

t: What I can do if Amazon give me empty box instead of item? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 9): You have to be able to prove to them that you never got the item. They will say that the item was shipped and delivered. What you can do is call the place it was shipped from and file a complaint and hope they have mercy on your words. The investigation will be long and drawn out.
Find more solutions · We can't find the page you were trying to reach. We apologize for the inconvenience

t: What should you do if your Amazon package is missing one of the items you ordered? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I’ve had that happen just once. What I did was contact the seller and explain I order 2 of X, and received 1 of X. They immediately apologized and said a replacement would be shipped forthwith. It was, and I received it. Now, in a sense is was my word against the order. Howeve...

I’m selling on Amazon through FBA for the past few months and never had an issue with my shipments. I shipped off some packages last month and as Amazon checked in and received my boxes, they claimed that one box was empty! Instead of the 3 pieces that were DEFINITELY inside.

t: Amazon Return Policy - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · Easy shopping, simple returns - that's our promise. At Amazon, we're committed to making your shopping experience as seamless and worry-free as possible. We understand that there may be times when a purchase may not meet your expectations or your needs might change.

t: Amazon is claiming I had sent an empty box (which they ...
s: We typically pack four units in a larger box, clearly indicating the number of units inside, a practice we've followed numerous times before. However, it's been more frequent that Amazon is now claiming that it's my fault for sending only one shipment when they were expecting four units. This frustrating experience is one of the reasons I've decided to discontinue using FBA. Given our lack of competition and our ability to ship out within 1-2 ...

t: Find a Missing Item from Your Package - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you've received a package and an item from your order is missing, the item may have been shipped separately. Check Your Orders.

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - Items are missing or damaged from your Amazon order? Here are how you can contact Customer Support to get replacement items. It's very easy to contact the support and they are super fast in resolving the issues

t: Amazon Plans To Deliver Without A Box
s: August 16, 2023 - There will be stickers on the box to ensure delivery to the right address.

t: Lost my own buy box, yet I'm the only one selling this ...
s: There are other sellers who are selling a generic version of my improved product at 4 times my current price and they have the buy box. not sure what i'm missing.. ... So I have a branded product, with a patent, and I'm the only one selling it. I've had no issues with the buy box till this morning.
